casebody.data:
No. 18, Ex parte: In the Matter of Fernando Vazquez Morales et al.; Petitioners. Decided April 15, 1907. Mr. Charles C. Lancaster and Mr. Herbert E. Smith for petitioners.

Original.

Motion for leave to file submitted April 8, 1907.

Motion for leave to file petition for appeal granted, and appeal allowed on appellants filing bond in the penal sum of $1,000, conditioned according to law, to be approved by the Supreme Court of Porto Rico.
